DOC.brief_title: Prefatory Study Explore Changes Nasal Mucociliary Clearance Standardize Nasal Scraping Procedure
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria meet Visit 1 Visit 2 : Male subject age ≥25 ≤40 year old . Subject 's BMI comprise 18.0 kg/m2 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive . Subject healthy , judged Investigator . Additional Inclusion Criteria allocate subject one two group : Nonmenthol cigarette smoker : A positive urine cotinine test ( ≥200 ng/mL ) . Smoked least 20 cigarette per day least past 5 year . eCO level > 10 part per million ( ppm ) . No plan quit smoke next 3 month . Never smoker : Subject smoke less 100 cigarette throughout lifetime cigarette past 3 year . A negative urine cotinine test ( < 200 ng/mL ) . eCO level ≤ 5 ppm . As per Investigator 's judgment , subject participate study reason ( e.g. , medical , psychiatric , and/or social reason ) . Inability taste sweet within 60 minute STT test . Any condition Principal Investigator designee cause believe would interfere procedure upper low airway function . This could include , limited , nasal/septum deviation , nasal polyp nasal allergy .
